DOC.brief_summary: This long-term outcomes study is designed to collect safety and efficacy data on designated, commercially available, Tornier hip arthroplasty products.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study to Evaluate Long-Term Outcome in Hip Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: man or woman >18, Indication of arthroplasty with Tornier hip devices, which are part of the study, the patient benefits from a health care system, the patient agreed for study participation. existing tumor and, or particularly high surgical risk, anesthetic risk class IV or higher, subject is under guardianship and/or unable to follow procedures or matters related to the study. (Examples: Illiterate, recent psychotic or mania disorders and / or inability to comply with usual followup visits.), contraindications for arthroplasty with a hip Tornier device (see list of contraindications listed in the Instructions For Use (IFU) of the device(s)).
